transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ya, se bol rahi hu.
Executive: Boliye madam.
Customer: Hello. Ji, Manisha bol rahi hu se India Mart se. Sir hum log na ye account aapka disable kar rahe hain, theek hai? Aur ye aapka seven to eight working days mein ho jayega disable.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur ye disable hone ke matlab abhi hum logo ka concern aapka raise hua tha na India Mart pe, theek hai? Isliye maine aapko inform kiya hai ki ye company hum log disable kar rahe hain, theek hai? Aur aapki company jo hai wo matlab disable ho jayegi sir. Jab aapko karana hoga to dobara aapko jab update karana hoga to aap kara sakte hain but abhi hum log account aapka disable kar rahe hain.
Customer: Okay madam, kar dijiye please.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur ek aur cheez aapne na concern raise kiya tha India Mart pe na, to hamare paas customer care pe ticket open ho jati hai, to wo main close kar rahi hu sir. Aur aapko thoda sa wait karna padega. Kaunsa ticket close kar rahe ho madam?
Customer: Jo aapne customer care pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Customer care pe pura pura jab mera problem jab pura solve ho jaye tabhi query solve kijiye na madam. Okay kijiye na. Mera abhi problem kaha solve hua hai madam? Meri baat suniye madam, meri baat suniye, ek baat sun lijiye meri madam.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Mera aapne jo bhi hua hai wo bande ne jo bhi kiya hai lekin DSM ke naam pe jo main product nahi bech raha hu wo sab dikh rahi hai. Mera problem abhi sort out nahi hua hai. To main query kaise usko okay karunga done karunga main. To please pehle isko close ye problem solve kijiye baad mein query close kijiye na please.
Executive: Sir ye na hum logo ka main bata deti hu. Hum log wo na jaise concern aapka raise hua, theek hai? Maine aapko inform kar diya ki hum log actionable jo abhi action lena hai wo hum log yaha se process kar rahe hain but usme seven to eight days jo hai time lagega. Ye bhi main aapko communicate kar chuki hu aur ye hamari call na recording line pe chal rahi hai sir, theek hai? To agar aap matlab itna time tak na main ticket aapki nahi rakh sakti hu na sir agar main ye ticket itna time tak. Aisa ho jaye na ki abhi abhi problem problem matlab hum log solve kar rahe hain to do char din rahega jo bhi aap solve kar rahe hain uske baad usko kijiye na. Aur mere ko kab tak answer milega mere mere ko aap aap yaha ye number pe batayenge kaise samjhega mere ko ki mera query solve ho gaya hai?
Executive: Sir aapko na hum logo jaise ye account disable hoga na, ek to main aapko communicate kar rahi hu, theek hai? Dusra aap India Mart pe search karke bhi dekh sakte hain aur aisa nahi hai sir hume bhi samajh aa raha hai ki yaha par dispute hua hai partners ke beech, theek hai? To actionable cheez yahi hai aapko bhi. Partner ne mere ko cheat kiya hai na madam. Partner ne usne Manish bhai ne actually mere ko cheat kiya hai. Right? To main hum log wo haan aur wo actually agar wo us pe rakhta hai to bhi theek hai lekin usne paid paid service le bhi li hai, itna sara paisa bhar diya hai, use kar raha hai aur us pe bech bhi raha hoga na kuch na kuch to us pe query aayi aayi rahegi ya nahi aayi rahegi?
Customer: Haan hmm hmm material ke liye. To to main wo mere naam se wo paisa bech raha hai, are material bech raha hai, paisa kama raha hai aur mere ko pata nahi hai. Main trust pe abhi mera main meri taraf se usko close karke baitha hua hu. Mera firm chal nahi raha hai main GST sab bhar raha hu. Barabar? To wo to mere ko cheat kiya. Actually ye to cheating ka case ho gaya hai madam. Jis mein actually aapne aapne bhale wo aapki taraf se wo sahi hai ke bhai aapne dekha nahi GST and aapne trust karke rakh diya ki ye to pehle ka hi hai. But kahi na kahi galti India Mart ki or se bhi hui hai ki jabhi aapke paas agar koi paid service ke liye aata hai to aapko tabhi fresh aapko GST certification lena chahiye. Lekin aapne wo liya nahi and aapko aapne usko continue karke aapne paisa le liye. To ye to cheating hua main consumer matlab kahi pe bhi ja ke aapke aapke against mein uske against mein dono ke against mein likhit mein claim kar sakta hu. Samajhiye aap meri baat.
Executive: Dekho aapka request bhi to hum log wahi to ab as per GST hum log kaam karte hain aur ye GST aaj ka registered nahi hai, GST hamare paas char saal se registered hai aur paid subscription registered hai sir. Haan aur invoice jo hum dete hain sir wo aapke account pe hi dete hain aapki company account pe hi dete hain. Aapki aapki sab baatein agree karta hu lekin problem to hua hai na madam. Aap karte ho. Aur yaha par hamara actionable cheez ye hai ki hum log ye account disable kar de because aap being the owner of the company of DSM speciality chemicals to aap hume bol rahe hain account disable karna hai. To hamara action to yahi hai ki hum account isse disable kar de but jo working hours jayenge ya jo working days jayenge sir wo process ke through hi jayenge. Main aisa nahi bol rahi hu aapko ki aap jo request kar rahe hain hum wo nahi karenge hum kisi ko favor karne wale hain. Obviously baat hai hum as per GST policy hum log policy pe hi kaam karte hain. GST pe jo owners hai agar aap bolenge disable karne ke liye to disable ho jayega account but wo working hours to jayenge na sir. Wo le lijiye. Uske liye hi main bol rahi hu thoda sa patience rakh lijiye. Aapki request already registered hai sir. Ye aapka thoda sa time jayega aur main ticket bhi isliye close kar rahi hu kyunki hum log itna time tak ticket hold nahi kar sakte, hum itna time ticket hum pending nahi rakh sakte hain.
Customer: Wo aapke aapke end se aap decision le lijiye ki hum log wo kar rahe hain baki mere end pe main wo ticket close karne ke liye nahi bolunga. Dusri baat ye hai madam ki ye actual mein mein India Mart ki bahut badi galti hai hi hai ke aapne without check kiye ye kar diya hai madam. Barabar? To ye ye to main wo bande ke samne to jo karunga wo karunga hi karunga lekin wo main India Mart ko bhi le sakta hu us case mein ki aapne kahi na kahi GST kya nahi hai.
Executive: Sir hum log theek hai main aapka ticket nahi close karti hu theek hai hum log jaldi se jaldi isse disable karate hain, theek hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi main aapko pata lagega ki main kaha kaha ja sakta hu and main waha pe aapke against mein and uske against mein dono ke against mein bol sakta hu ki mera GST ka number ka use karke ye log aap customer bana rahe hain and wo banda mera wo bhi mere ko cheat kar raha hai. Aap samajhiye. Theek hai aap aap dekhiye jaldi se jaldi sort out karke dijiye nahi to main iske against mein definitely action lunga, theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer accuses partner of cheating using GST number.

- Wants query to remain open until issue is resolved.

- Claims IndiaMART is also at fault.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to not close the ticket.

- Executive explained account disabling process.

- Executive mentioned the call is on recording.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer threatened legal action.



Alert (If Any):

- fraud

- complaint

- escalation



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, cheating, disable account, legal action
